commit.message:
name-finder.cc (lookup): Check for a NULL _Jv_argv before attempting lookup.

2000-11-23  Mark Wielaard  <mark@klomp.org>

	* name-finder.cc (lookup): Check for a NULL _Jv_argv before
	attempting lookup.

From-SVN: r37687
